title: Flowmaster Force II Cat-back Exhaust System 11-14 Ford F-150 3.5L EcoBoost - 817539
description:
Questions? Give us a call (707) 544-4761
View this product: http://bit.ly/1fZppXj
Visit Flowmaster's website: http://bit.ly/1fyGZRh

Flowmaster Part #817539

Test Vehicle: 2014 Ford F-150 3.5L

Application:
2011 to 2014 Ford F-150 with a 3.5L Eco Boost Turbo V6 engine, fits all wheelbases.

Features:
For the person who wants the look of a traditional dual exhaust system with all the benefits that a Flowmaster Cat-back exhaust system provides, DOR/S systems are the perfect choice. This system includes exit pipes for both dual out rear and dual outside configurations so that you can choose the one that fits your style. Force II systems deliver a moderate exterior tone and moderate to mild interior tone, and are suited to customers looking for efficiency improvements without a lot of noise. Especially recommended for towing applications. Like all Flowmaster systems, the benefits include improved throttle response, power and mileage. Designed for an easy fit, this system includes all necessary parts and hardware for easy installation.

✓ Mandrel bent 16 gauge 409 stainless tubing
✓ Mild to moderate exterior exhaust tone
✓ Includes hangers and hardware for easy installation
✓ Connects after factory catalytic converter
✓ Dyno tuned for maximum performance
✓ Premium Flowmaster quality
